subtitle: Momentum oscillator (0–100) to spot overbought/oversold.

measures.how_to_read: Above 70 often overbought; below 30 oversold. Crosses of 50 can mark trend bias.
measures.typical_ranges: 20–80 common; 30/70 for extremes; use 40/60 in strong trends.
measures.caveats: RSI can stay extreme during strong trends; extremes alone are not entry signals.

assistant_hints: Use 30/70 as a start; shift to 40/60 in strong trends.
Prefer crosses back through thresholds over static extremes.
Combine with trend filter (e.g., EMA) to reduce fade risk.
Avoid trading solely on RSI during news-driven sessions.
beginner_summary: RSI shows when a symbol may be oversold (<30) or overbought (>70). Use it to quickly find possible rebounds or exhaustion.
